content: all my patterns are for personal use only nae = seedlings in japanese the color of the yarn reminds me of the cherry blossom in kyoto especially the beautiful philosopher s path 哲学の道 tetsugaku no michi ---------------------------------------------------------------------- nae is a reversible shawl knitted from side to side it s simple and clean lines show off the beauty of the yarn and stitches gauge in st st 24 sts x 31 row = 4 10cm size 64 75 164 5cm w x 20 5 52cm h ---------------------------------------------------------------------- a matching hat pattern kozue 1 is also available to use any leftover yarn ---------------------------------------------------------------------- thank you to all my wonderful test knitters you made this experience so great ---------------------------------------------------------------------- **nae in italiano ** after clicking free ravelry download choose your english or italian version thank you to isabel 2 for the translation 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/kozue--- 2 http //www ravelry com/people/isa1950
